```{r data import, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
at_data <- read_csv("Data/Processed/brief-squid.csv")
lo_data <- read_csv("Data/Processed/loligo-squid.csv")
two_data <- read_csv("Data/Processed/two-squids.csv")

two_data$season <- factor(two_data$Season, levels=c(3, 1, 2))

species_list <- split(two_data, two_data$Species)


two_data$month <- ifelse(two_data$Season == "Fall", 9,
                        ifelse(two_data$Season == "Summer", 6,
                               ifelse(two_data$Season == "Spring", 3, NA)))


```

## Analysis

## 1. Atlantic Breif Squid
### a. Spatial Characteristics
```{r depth, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
tmodel <- lm(data = two_data, wtcpue ~ Depth)
summary(tmodel)
amodel <- lm(data = at_data, wtcpue ~ Depth)
summary(amodel)
lmodel <- lm(data = lo_data, wtcpue ~ Depth)
summary(lmodel)
```

```{r depth, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
ggplot(data = at_data, aes(y=Depth, x=wtcpue, color = Season))+
  geom_point(alpha=0.7,size=0.7)+
  geom_smooth(method = "lm", se = FALSE, size=0.7)+
  scale_y_reverse()+
  labs(title = "Vertical Distribution of Atlantic Brief Squid",
       y = "Depth(m)",
       x = "Weight Count per Unit Effort")
```
